explanation: There is a mix of opinions with both bullish and bearish perspectives, but notable bullish sentiments are present: traders discussing potential buying if BTC holds above resistance (Pramod Bhoite), accumulation plans from the US government (K P), and retail investors moving retirement funds into BTC. Some caution is advised due to short-term volatility, visible sideways action, and calls for patience until a daily close confirms the uptrend.
representative_opinions: If market 107179 ki liquidity lekar ek bullish candle 107425 ke upar close krti hai to buying aa sakti hai. (Pramod Bhoite)
JUST IN: White House official says the US government has an 'accumulation plan' to buy Bitcoin. (K P)
I made my money in the stonk market. Moving my retirement fund to BTC. (Teresa Hunt)
If there is any extension past July 9th, that could be a big driver for the next leg up. However, I have no idea what happens there, so caution is definitely warranted. (RaberTrades)
